scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist'); ['index.html','styles.css','script.js','paw_curser.svg'].forEach(f => {if(fs.existsSync(f)) fs.copyFileSync(f, path.join('dist',f));}); console.log('Build completed - files copied to dist');"
scripts.build:azure: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.mkdirSync('dist'); ['index.html','styles.css','script.js','paw_curser.svg'].forEach(f => {if(fs.existsSync(f)) fs.copyFileSync(f, path.join('dist',f));}); console.log('Azure build completed - files copied to dist');"
